title: Cab Drinker’s Merlot Tasting
description:
Join us on Wednesday, June 11, from 4–7 PM at Whispering Vine South Creek for a tasting crafted for Cabernet lovers who are ready to discover the depth and richness of great Merlot. Bold, structured, and packed with character, these Merlots are anything but shy.

Tasting Fee: $35 (Buy a bottle from the tasting and your fee is refunded)

Featured Wines:

• PlumpJack Merlot 2022 – Complex and layered with cherry, raspberry, sweet earth, dried herbs, and a finish of espresso and baker’s chocolate, framed by plush tannins and lively acidity.

• Whitehall Lane Merlot 2019 – 91 pts, James Suckling & Wine Spectator. Vibrant and structured with ripe plum, raspberry, mocha, and fine-grained tannins.

• Roots Run Deep Educated Guess Merlot 2020 – Rich and approachable with wild berries, chocolate, ripe plums, and oak, perfect for pairing with hearty dishes.

• Opolo Summit Creek Merlot 2021 – Lush and inviting with blue fruit, cocoa nib, tobacco leaf, and fresh, seamless textures on the finish.

Discover why Merlot deserves a place in every Cabernet drinker’s glass—buy a bottle and your tasting is free.
